src:
Encuentran sin vida a dos mujeres en Ecatepec; estaban maniatadas
01 Nov 2019, 21:04 by Notimex
Los cuerpos sin vida de dos mujeres fueron localizados en las calles de Chapultepec y José López Portillo, en este municipio, en la zona conocida como la Barranca de la colonia La Joya.
Personal de la Fiscalía General de Justicia del Estado de México arribó al lugar para levantar los cuerpos y realizar las primeras investigaciones del hallazgo de las mujeres de entre 25 y 30 años de edad.
Según vecinos de la zona, las dos mujeres se encontraban maniatadas entre dos árboles que se ubican a las afueras de un verificentro, y no mostraban huellas de disparos. Hasta el momento no se saben las causas de su muerte.
De acuerdo con medio locales, los servicios forenses también arribaron al lugar para realizar el levantamiento de los cuerpos y llevarlos al Semefo del estado, para realizar los estudios pertinentes e identificar a las víctimas.
text:
They find lifeless two women in Ecatepec; they were bound
01 Nov 2019, 21:04 by Notimex
The lifeless bodies of two women were located in the streets of Chapultepec and José López Portillo, in this municipality, in the area known as the Barranca de la Colonia La Joya.
Personnel of the Attorney General of the State of Mexico arrived at the site to lift the bodies and carry out the first investigations of the finding of women between 25 and 30 years of age.
According to neighbors in the area, the two women were clustered between two trees that are located on the outskirts of a verificent, and showed no shooting marks. So far the causes of his death are unknown.
According to local media, the forensic services also arrived at the site to carry out the lifting of the bodies and take them to the State Department, to carry out the relevant studies and identify the victims.
